verses.verse: The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> (for he was the <S%H1060>firstborn;<s%> <S%H2490>but,<s%> because he defiled his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H3326>couch,<s%> his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the genealogy is not to be <S%H3187>reckoned<s%> after the <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>
For <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> above his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and of him came the <S%H5057>prince;<s%> but the <S%H1062>birthright<s%> was <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s:)
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> and <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel:<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H4318>Micah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7211>Reaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>

<S%H880>Beerah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> whom Tilgath <S%H8407>Pilneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> carried <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H5387>captive:<s%> he was prince of the <S%H7206>Reubenites.<s%>

His <S%H251>brothers<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> when the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of their <S%H8435>generations<s%> was <S%H3187>reckoned:<s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%>

and <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5811>Azaz,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8087>Shema,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> even to <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and Baal <S%H1186>Meon:<s%>

and <S%H4217>eastward<s%> he <S%H3427>lived<s%> even to the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> because their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> were <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H1905>Hagrites,<s%> who <S%H5307>fell<s%> by their <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and they <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H6440>throughout<s%> all the land <S%H4217>east<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> over against <S%H776>them,<s%> in the land of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> to <S%H5548>Salecah:<s%>
<S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H8223>Shapham<s%> the <S%H4932>second,<s%> and <S%H3285>Janai,<s%> and <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

Their <S%H251>brothers<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses:<s%> <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> and <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> and <S%H7652>Sheba,<s%> and <S%H3140>Jorai,<s%> and <S%H3275>Jacan,<s%> and <S%H2127>Zia,<s%> and <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> <S%H7651>seven.<s%>

These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2359>Huri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3386>Jaroah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3454>Jeshishai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3163>Jahdo,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H938>Buz;<s%>
<S%H277>Ahi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5661>Abdiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>
They <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and in its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in all the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> of <S%H8289>Sharon,<s%> as far as their <S%H8444>borders.<s%>

All these were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogies<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half-tribe<s%> <S%H7626><s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> of valiant <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H2428>men<s%> able to <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H4043>buckler<s%> and <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and to <S%H1869>shoot<s%> with <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and <S%H3925>skillful<s%> in <S%H4421>war,<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> - <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty,<s%> that were able to go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H6635>war.<s%>
They <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H1905>Hagrites,<s%> with <S%H3195>Jetur,<s%> and <S%H5305>Naphish,<s%> and <S%H5114>Nodab.<s%>

They were <S%H5826>helped<s%> against <S%H1905>them,<s%> and the Hagrites were <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and all who were with <S%H2199>them;<s%> for they cried to <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and he was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> of <S%H982>them,<s%> because they put their trust in him.

They took <S%H7617>away<s%> their <S%H4735>livestock;<s%> of their <S%H1581>camels<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and of <S%H6629>sheep<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and of <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> two <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and of <S%H120>men<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>
For there <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2491>slain,<s%> because the <S%H4421>war<s%> was of <S%H430>God.<s%> They <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their place until the <S%H1473>captivity.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H2677>half-tribe<s%> <S%H7626><s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> they <S%H7235>increased<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> to Baal <S%H1179>Hermon<s%> and <S%H8149>Senir<s%> and <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1179>Hermon.<s%>

These were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses:<s%> even <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> and <S%H3469>Ishi,<s%> and <S%H447>Eliel,<s%> and <S%H5837>Azriel,<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> and <S%H1938>Hodaviah,<s%> and <S%H3164>Jahdiel,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H8034>famous<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses.<s%>

They <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> stirred <S%H5782>up<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6322>Pul<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of Tilgath <S%H8407>Pilneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and he carried them <S%H1540>away,<s%> even the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half-tribe<s%> <S%H7626><s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H2477>Halah,<s%> and <S%H2249>Habor,<s%> and <S%H2024>Hara,<s%> and to the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H1470>Gozan,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
